function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Overcrowding due to reservation system limitations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proximity of lockers, toilets, and change booths may increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of individuals in the swimming pool and jacuzzi areas may lead to the spread of contagions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in the indoor running track area may lead to stagnant air and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to limited window openings, increasing the risk of airborne disease spread","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of injuries from accidental falls due to uneven walls and varying voids along the track","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for surface contamination on the track flooring leading to the spread of infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Condensed arrangement of equipment may increase the risk of close contact and the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposed and painted black air ducts may contribute to the spread of airborne contaminants and pathogens within the hall.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of individuals and shared equipment increases the risk of fomite transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation due to fixed windows and limited airflow control","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective occupancy management and monitoring","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of surface transmission due to shared equipment and facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete temperature testing may allow asymptomatic carriers to enter the facility, increasing the risk of disease spread.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of mask-wearing may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within the facility.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of full body sterilizers and reliance only on hand sanitizers can result in inadequate disinfection of individuals entering the facility.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous cleaning and sterilization practices may not be effective in preventing the spread of contagious diseases if not done properly or if the cleaning products used are not effective against the specific pathogen.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Removal of shared and reusable resources may reduce the risk of surface contamination, but if not replaced with adequate alternatives, it may lead to dissatisfaction among building occupants.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited occupancy measures may not be effectively enforced without proper control measures or technologies, leading to overcrowding and increased risk of physical interactions and disease transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of towels hangers and lockers increases the risk of contagious disease transmission among members.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear markings and separation of warm-up areas and running lanes increases the potential for members to interact closely, leading to an increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient cleaning and sterilization of equipment and machines increases the risk of disease transmission among gym members.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Members not pre-booking on the digital calendar","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Masks being taken off during group sessions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited number of interactions between members allowed","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased occupancy during nighttime operation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of spatial arrangement for equipment and crowded queuing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for virtual training classes and reduced interaction","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protective equipment and cleaning tools for janitors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination in cleaning and operation processes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate post-pandemic measures for facility prevention and preparedness","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Replacement of air duct types from aluminum to fabric could lead to the spread of contaminants if not managed properly.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of filters in diffusers increases the risk of spreading contaminants through the supplied air.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection measures can lead to the spread of contagious diseases within the facility.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infrequent cleaning of air diffusers and lack of complete sterilization sessions increase the risk of indoor contamination.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate spatial configuration increases the risk of disease transmission during intensive exercise sessions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of precautionary measures in health club facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of health club facility risks in relation to pandemic propagation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent implementation of precautionary measures across modular health club facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate precautionary measures in sports facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of quantifiable measures in the assessment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impacts on public and private sports organizations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of detailed poe studies for health club facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of schematics instead of accurate drawings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited descriptive material based on quantitative methods","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global lack of access to vaccines","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in cancer diagnoses due to pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Missed regular vaccinations for other infectious diseases during lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Racial minorities at higher risk of infection","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socioeconomically deprived populations vulnerable to nphis targeting covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
